ygData.subject: Re: New Survey
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/7/99 6:00:32 PM Mountain Daylight Time, EQ_Masters-owner@ONElist.com writes:
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/7/99 6:00:32 PM Mountain Daylight Time,
EQ_Masters-owner@... writes:

<< Which class, in your opinion, is the most
powerful overall? >>

i'm going to have to dissagree with the answer of a bard... look at the class
that no one complains about... thats how you tell which is most powerfull...
and of course.. its the magician... We can solo easily up to mid 30's and are
completly self sufficient... i can go on an island somewhere in oot and hunt
there for 20 levels strait never having to leave except for spells... A
magician is basically a wizzard with a built in tank... as well as a few
other features such as summoning some very powerfull weapons... no we can't
kite... and no we can't heal... but we sure can kill... i've been soloing
reds and yellows for my entier 29 levels as a magician... now thats
powerfull...
